title: A Crack in Everything
description: In this Dateline classic, when a woman is found dead in her home, it's ruled a suicide. But when a new investigation begins, police question if this is a murder case. Will the truth be revealed? Keith Morrison reports. Originally aired on NBC on March 30, 2018.
author: nbcnews.podcasts@gmail.com (NBC News)
